```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(ASSRFourier)
library(rmarkdown)
if(plot.all==TRUE){
   print(FouierCSVToPlot(data.path, freq = freq, names=names, sqrt.trans=sqrt.trans))
}
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(ASSRFourier)
if(plot.single==TRUE){
  for(i in 1:length(data.path)){
   print(FouierCSVToPlot(data.path[i], freq = freq, title=title[i], sqrt.trans=sqrt.trans))
  cat("\n\n")
  }
}
```
